list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Fix DatabaseManager validateUser method and correct PreparedStatement parameters
- Replaced incorrect hardcoded values (root, 12345) with method parameters - Fixed SQL execution errors - Improved testConnection() validation - Added missing login attempt and IP blocking methods Add SIDRS main startup logic with DB connection check
